text: Came in great condition and on time
El pedido se entregÃ³ a tiempo sin problemas

This is the 3rd phone we have bought from this seller! All of the phones we have ever purchased including this one was in better condition than described! Why pay $1200 for a phone you can get for $200 or less??  Shipping was done through FedEx and it came  in 2-3 days!! The phones was packed in a nice box so it wouldn't be damaged in transport and it even came with a new charger and wall plug.  We will definitely buy from this seller again and have saved him as a trusted seller on our account.

Fantastic experience! Condition listed as very good. One tiny chip on the side of the frame.  Looks flawless outside of that! Seller replied quickly to my questions. Shipped over night and well packed. At 1/2 off the brand new price, with a 1 year warranty! You can't beat it! I will be upgrading from these guys from now on!

My very sharp looking unlocked IRIS flip phone arrived today in better than described condition. Super fast shipping. Extremely well packaged. Excellent price and seller who possesses EXTRAORDINARY communication skills. This is the third one I've have purchased from this highly recommended provider and am extremely pleased with them all.

AWESOME SELLER!! Item was exactly as described, completely brand new & sealed. Shipped out the very next day of putting the order in and securely packaged. I tested out the item and it worked perfectly; connected to my phone seamlessly. And to get it at the price point that I did? Best deal! I am glad that I purchased it through this seller and will keep this seller in mind for any future purchases for sure! Thank you!

Order arrived in less than a week. This was listed as refurbished excellent condition. Earbuds were packaged well. They looked new from factory. Left earbud had a static sound in it. I contacted the seller and they replied in less than 24 hours. I submitted the return request and had a return label in less than 24 hours and a credit was applied to my account as soon as they got the earbuds back. Top notch customer service. I would buy from here again.

The item ( galaxy tab s9 ultra) was in excellent condition. Better than described. It didn't come in the original box but it was in (new in box) condition. I'm very happy with the condition of the device. Also, the seller sent the item lightning fast. I ordered on Thursday and it was delivered on Saturday. That's basically Amazon speed. And lastly the price was unbeatable. I've seen other items with less qualify, for higher prices. I def recommend buying from this seller. 5 stars!

This was THE fastest free shipping ever! My refurbished Oura Ring arrived way sooner than expected and was packed perfectly. It looks almost brand new with only a couple of tiny scratches just as described. Works great, synced instantly, and battery life is amazing. The listing description was 100% accurate! The packaging was perfect as well! secure, neat, and clearly handled with care. Amazing value and great appearance. 10/10 experience! ğŸ‘ğŸ½
Totally reliable seller. Highly recommend! ğŸŒŸğŸ’–

I've had this Zfold 5 activated for a few days now trying to aclimate myself to a new type of phone. The seller was very communicative with immediate response to my questions. Packaged well and sent via FedEx, so lightning speed on the part of the seller! STILL getting used to the phone. Definitely recommend this seller to buy your phone. A++++
